message.welcome-paragraph: We are excited to welcome you to our community! Activate your account by clicking on the Activate button, and you'll be ready to start saving for real.

error.register-failed: Error! Registration could not be completed

success.restore-send-email: We've sent a password reset email!

title.title: Savings Account
title.subtitle: watch your money grow like never before

hero.description: Saving easily is possible with T-Bank. Open your account and start managing your savings from anywhere. Grow your money day by day with us.

title.title: ¿How does work?
title.subtitle: Saving with us is easy and hassle-free. Open your account and start enjoying the highest market interest rates, all from wherever you want. If you need us, we'll always be here to support you.

obj1.title: Sign Up
obj1.subtitle: Create your account and complete identity verification quickly and securely.

obj2.title: Invest
obj2.subtitle: Easily deposit cryptocurrencies, check our guide if you've never done it before.

obj3.title: Save
obj3.subtitle: Enjoy the superior returns we offer. Grow your investments!

video.title: Make your money truly work for you!
video.description: We tend to be cautious, especially with money, but we also enjoy sharing what makes us feel secure and is beneficial.

credit.title: Credit Lines
credit.paragraph1: Accessing our credit lines is an excellent way to make your goals a reality, whether for personal projects or unexpected needs. With an interest rate of
credit.paragraph2: per month, we offer one of the best options on the market, designed to provide support and confidence every step of the way.
credit.paragraph3: Discover our special conditions and start reaching your goals today!

math.title: Investment Simulator
math.paragraph1: Saving with us is easy and hassle-free. Open your account and start enjoying the highest market interest rates, all from wherever you want. If you need us, we'll always be here to support you.
math.paragraph2: The T-Bank Staking simulation gives you an estimated calculation of your investment value, the term, and the rate in effect at the time of inquiry. Remember, this information is for reference only and does not constitute a commercial offer.

support.title: ¿Need Help?
support.description: Our main goal is to make your life easier. So if you need assistance, just press a button.

footer.paragraph1: Make your money truly work for you!

hero.description: Our innovative platform focuses on cryptocurrency savings and offers staking options that allow our users to achieve attractive returns. We invest in a decentralized exchange and cryptocurrency mining, enabling us to generate higher returns.

about.title: ¿About us?
about.paragraph1: At T-bank, we are a group of investors passionate about the revolution that the decentralization of money can bring to the financial world. We firmly believe that removing intermediaries is key to empowering our clients, allowing them to maximize their capital returns.
about.paragraph2: Our innovative platform focuses on cryptocurrency savings and offers staking options that allow our users to achieve attractive returns. We invest in a decentralized exchange and cryptocurrency mining, enabling us to generate higher returns and pass them on to our clients.
about.paragraph3: Invest smartly and watch your money grow.

title.title: Services
title.subtitle: Saving with us is easy and hassle-free. Open your account and start enjoying the highest market interest rates, all from wherever you want. If you need us, we'll always be here to support you. apply

description.paragraph1: We offer a savings account that allows you to earn up to
description.paragraph2: Annual Effective Rate, giving you the freedom to access your funds at any time without extra charges. It's the perfect option for those looking for a profitable and secure alternative for their savings, without the complications of additional fees.

description.paragraph1: Access our credit lines with a competitive interest rate of just
description.paragraph2: per month and amounts up to
description.paragraph3: We provide a flexible and accessible option to finance your projects or personal needs. Enjoy clear conditions, manageable payments, and the peace of mind of having the support you need to reach your goals.

description.paragraph1: Invest smartly by locking your balance in staking and earn up to
description.paragraph2: Annual Effective Rate. With this defined-term investment strategy, your money grows while you enjoy peace of mind and assured returns.

services.deafult: Make your money truly work for you!

title.title: Frequently Asked Questions
title.subtitle: Explore our FAQ section to resolve your doubts quickly. Find detailed answers to the most common questions about platform use, features, support, and more. Start here and take advantage of all the resources we've prepared for you!

title.title: Tutorials
title.subtitle: Learn how to navigate and use each platform tool with our detailed tutorials and guides. From basics to advanced features, these resources will show you step-by-step how to optimize your experience, manage your activities, and make the most of each feature to achieve your goals.

meta.description: Tizorbank transforms the way you think about your finances; an innovative fintech that offers the opportunity to grow your money with superior daily returns. Through our investment platform, you can invest securely and hassle-free, watching your savings generate constant returns day after day.
meta.information: Security is our priority. To ensure you always have full control over your funds and avoid any inconveniences, it's essential to keep your user data updated. Maintaining your information is key to us managing your capital efficiently and without risks.

updateInfo.title: Update Information
updateInfo.description: Tizorbank is not responsible for losses or inconveniences if the user does not keep their address updated or loses access to their digital wallet. It is essential to have up-to-date data to ensure the security of investments and continuous access to funds.

message.success: Updated! You have successfully changed your virtual wallet.
message.information: Keep your data updated to avoid transaction losses.

invoice.description: The confirmation of the transaction may take up to 36 hours to verify. During this time, our system will process your request to ensure the security of each transaction. If you have any questions, contact our customer service.

information.alert: You have not made any deposits yet!
information.message: Add funds to your account and start generating interest.

message.success: Congratulations! You have successfully generated your invoice.
message.information: Transfer the amount in USDT to the indicated wallet address.

withdrawal.description: The confirmation of the transfer may take up to 36 hours to process. During this time, our system will ensure the security of each transaction. If you have any questions, contact our customer service.

information.alert: You have not made any withdrawals yet!
information.message: Transaction costs will depend on the selected network.

message.success: Congratulations! You have successfully generated the transfer request.
message.information: We will verify the transfer and send it in the coming hours.

investment.description: Invest your money in defined terms with Tizorbank and maximize your profits. By opting for this option, you ensure a higher return compared to traditional investments.

information.alert: You haven't made any investments yet!
information.message: Invest your money in defined terms and increase your profitability

description.txt1: The user has the option to cancel their investment at any time, which will trigger the refund of the initially invested funds. Additionally, an extra compensation will be provided, calculated based on the interest generated up to the cancellation date. This process offers a straightforward way to recover your investment.
description.txt2: It is important to note that the cancellation of the investment is irreversible and is executed immediately. Once the transaction is requested, it cannot be reversed or modified. Therefore, it is recommended to carefully consider your decision before proceeding with the cancellation.

unlock.information: The removal of the investment is irreversible, a penalty will be applied to the accumulated capital, the initial investment will be refunded along with an additional compensation calculated based on the interest generated up to the removal date. Please review the conditions carefully before proceeding.

message.success: Congratulations! You have successfully created a new investment.
message.information: The generated balance will be transferred to your account at the end of the investment period.

shared.description: Invite others to join and start generating passive daily earnings. Each new user who registers with your link and makes an investment will automatically generate interest. Your friends will enjoy the benefits of investing, and you will see your earnings grow each day. Share the opportunity to create wealth and maximize your income in our investor community.
shared.information: Send your invitation link and start generating earnings by inviting others to invest; you will earn daily interest from their investments. It's easy and quick!

information.message: Get passive income from your referrals
